name: A Solitary Android (Black Flag)
description:
This was made during a 48 hour game jam! The aim of the game is to last as long as you can in a falling apart space ship, where the only person on board is you, an android. So you must go fix areas where sparks are being emitted from. Good Luck!

Also, be careful as the gravity systems are failing!

Unfortunately, there was a small cut-scene when you clicked play but when I uploaded it, it didn't appear but that is why there is a blue blank screen anyway.
